semantic_identifier: [GOLD-13]: Display data sufficiency warnings and confidence cues in Fit Score UI
title: Display data sufficiency warnings and confidence cues in Fit Score UI

sections.text: Update the Fit Score UI to consume the existing backend data sufficiency diagnostics (sample size, recency, signal coverage) and clearly surface a “Limited data” state when thresholds aren’t met. Show a compact summary (e.g., n=<count>, coverage=<%>, last updated=<date>) with a tooltip/modal explaining how low data may impact reliability. Ensure the warning state is reflected anywhere fit score is shown (segment list, segment detail, and exports/screenshots where applicable).
